attributes.action: Ensure that all non UK registerd vheicles entering the UK are to prove valid insurance and pay a road lisence fee proportionate to length of stay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure that all vehicles brought in to in Great Britain from where-ever should prove they have legal car insurance.  They should also pay a road lisence fee proportionate to their lenght of stay circa £10 per week.
